title: COLD SHRIMP RAMEN SALAD WITH SESAME DR
directions: In a small 8-inch nonstick sauté pan, heat oil and pour egg, and allow to cook through, like a thin pancake. Remove and let cool and cut into thin strips.
Divide noodles, shrimp, red peppers, carrots, cucumbers, scallions and corn between 2 bowls.
Pour dressing over and garnish with sesame seeds.
ingredients: ½ lb. shrimp, tail-on, cooked, peeled and deveined
